channel.title: Improving the community
channel.description:
Fellow members of the community we need to protect our self’s from hackers and leachers, also improving the server status page, and so far the only best way I figured out to stop leachers is through reputation, now do not accuse me of putting people with low reputation down and yes I know reputations just a number, but we can use that number for a good reason. And maybe block downloading link to new members well unstill they reach 15 reputation for you have to be a member of the community, and give them some test servers, like phonescape, satins isle? And have a specific section for new comers
[u][b]Like in the following picture..[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j270/n2lil/Blocking.png[/img]
As for the server status page we should make it that you need an account to post a server on it so we could track stuff much easier, aloes having a way to remove your server, and have a bar on the side saying if you need a certain client to play.
[u][b]As seen in the picture…well most of it…[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j270/n2lil/ServerPost-1.png[/img]
For hackers we should add some kind of “Terms & Agreements “when you use the server status page…like agreeing not to use cheat client or something
[u][b]Maybe Change some of the lettering[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j270/n2lil/Disclamer.png[/img]
[u][size=15pt]Comment I would like to know what you people think about it.....[/size][/u]
Thanks, Xdarklgiht.X

item.title: Improving the community
item.dc:creator: @remove_later remove_later
item.description:
@remove_later wrote:

[quote=“i–own–i, post:34, topic:149933”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=205407.msg1810128#msg1810128 date=1191822067]
What’s wrong with people using cheat clients? Is this not a website centered around cheating? In my opinion, you should do what Jagex does - find a way to stop those cheat clients, instead of complaining.

As for leechers, what are they leeching? Piece of shit servers that you guys see as the best thing since sliced bread?
[/quote]

Best post here.

Who cares if they leach that shit anyway Lol.[/quote]

Off topic, but aren’t you an annoying kid from Sythe?

Also, this thread still exists?
It’s obviously a cry for help from the MoparScape community and their ‘server status page’; also it has to do with the MoparScape community, so I say move it there.

Read full topic

item.title: Improving the community
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

frank_:

so it is a cheating community? wheres the fucking cheating then?[/quote][quote=“Silver Lining, post:30, topic:149933”]I’ll supplement frank_'s post. If there is no music being listened to, you don’t say you’re listening to music. It follows that you can’t call yourself a “cheating community” unless you’re actually cheating. After all, it’s one of your own rules that you don’t misrepresent.

To address both of your posts, one word:

SCAR

Now go beg for attention in another thread, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Improving the community
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:28, topic:149933”]I will try to address all of your suggestions here:

  1. I like people being able to download without registering, posting or acquiring rep, it stops spam.
  2. I already have the serverstatus page linked with accounts here by IP, that works fine.
  3. The serverstatus page originally had the ability to delete your own servers, but people started deleting and reposting hundreds of times to keep their server at 100%, obviously that didn’t work out.
  4. For the client, I don’t really care about other clients
  5. As for cheat clients, I don’t understand why people think I am against them, even moparscape has the most succesful RS2 bot to date built into it. Also this is a cheating community, why on earth would I disapprove of the use of ‘cheat’ clients? If server owners don’t want people to cheat, they can implement cheating detection routines just like jagex does, if they can’t, tough.[/quote]
    Nice speech mate

Read full topic

item.title: Improving the community
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

I’ll supplement frank_'s post. If there is no music being listened to, you don’t say you’re listening to music. It follows that you can’t call yourself a “cheating community” unless you’re actually cheating. After all, it’s one of your own rules that you don’t misrepresent.

Read full topic

item.title: Improving the community
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I will try to address all of your suggestions here:

  1. I like people being able to download without registering, posting or acquiring rep, it stops spam.
  2. I already have the serverstatus page linked with accounts here by IP, that works fine.
  3. The serverstatus page originally had the ability to delete your own servers, but people started deleting and reposting hundreds of times to keep their server at 100%, obviously that didn’t work out.
  4. For the client, I don’t really care about other clients
  5. As for cheat clients, I don’t understand why people think I am against them, even moparscape has the most succesful RS2 bot to date built into it. Also this is a cheating community, why on earth would I disapprove of the use of ‘cheat’ clients? If server owners don’t want people to cheat, they can implement cheating detection routines just like jagex does, if they can’t, tough.

Read full topic

tell them to learn java and make them fix it themself!

luckily i don’t. i have around 3.5k posts and there are 112994 toppics on the forums as of now.

It seems assif you do, you reply to everyones post even if it has nothing to do with you, and if your actually sad enough to check that out, you need a life my friend.
[/quote]

wow. i took 2 seonds to check the stats. wow. im lifeless.[/quote]
Lifeless and annoying.

Moparscape = Mopar, Moparisthebest = Wtf?[/quote]

They will slowly get active at mitb and use it for servers.

Here’s a reason your improvements won’t work: to change others, first you must change yourself.

HMM POST OF THE YEAR AWARD?

Take your tongue from out of this arse pls.

Post of the year awa for you[/quote]
hahaha thanks

item.title: Improving the community
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Bobby, post:7, topic:149933”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=205407.msg1809397#msg1809397 date=1191805591]

do people hack it lol? thats funny. i think it would be hard to make you need a forum account for the server status page.

ok my account from mopsrscape.org links up to here so why cant we do the same for the status page
[/quote]Thats what I pmed you also.
Coding is important.

Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org both have SMF forums.
To make them link up to each other you just change some database names in the smf files.
But the status page has nothing to do with smf.
If you want forum accounts linked to status page you have to code a whole new thing lol.
Lets see if you can.

thats what i said…[/quote]I know

[quote=“remove_later, post:1, topic:149957”][quote]
Get off
[/quote]
No, this is MITB, not your little MSCP playground.[/quote]
Actually the mod forum is on here, inculdes mscp

ThugLife:

So we can’t go on mopar because we dont like moparscape? shut up please.

A mistake from him.
Many people on moparscape don’t know the difference between mscp and mitb.
Moparscape = Mopar, Moparisthebest = Wtf?

Read full topic
